message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a great price considering the product's value to you is $8000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9500 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking of a price closer to the product's value to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10500. This is a fair compromise considering our previous offers.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a better compromise. I would like to propose an offer of $10200 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to find a compromise. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'll sell the product to you for $10750. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet at $10750. I would like to propose one last offer of $10600 for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement at $10750, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10800. This is my absolute lowest price, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
